attributes.action: require the government to return to the former manner of assessing the charge for a vehicle excise licence in relation to engine capacity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This was originally based on the fact that bigger engines were fitted to bigger and heavier cars which did more damage to road surfaces.  The present day purpose would also provide a green tax on large 'petrol guzzlers' and thus hopefully persuade the developement of greener vehicles and the purchase of smaller engined vehicles.  A provision could be made for larger vehicles used purely for agricultural use and a distance from base limit placed on their usage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
